### Complete ISO 27001 Management System

The Kudoo Power Platform transforms your ISO 27001 compliance from a periodic project to an integrated part of your business operations. Built entirely within the Microsoft ecosystem, our platform streamlines implementation, monitoring, and maintenance of your ISMS.

#### Core Components:

- **ISO 27001 Framework Management** - Complete implementation of the ISO 27001:2022 standard with all 93 controls organized across four domains.

- **Risk Management System** - Comprehensive tools for risk identification, assessment, treatment, and ongoing monitoring.

- **Evidence Management** - SharePoint-integrated repository for organizing and maintaining all compliance evidence.

- **Implementation Dashboard** - Real-time visibility into your compliance status with actionable insights and progress tracking.

- **Audit Preparation Tools** - Streamline internal and external audits with organized evidence and gap assessments.

## Frequently Asked Questions

::: {.row .g-4}
::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### How does Kudoo differ from general GRC platforms?

Unlike general GRC tools, Kudoo is purpose-built for ISO 27001 with a deep focus on Australian regulatory context. We provide specific control mapping, policy templates, and implementation guidance tailored to ISO 27001:2022, all within your Microsoft environment.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### Do I need Microsoft 365 to use Kudoo?

Yes, Kudoo is built specifically for the Microsoft ecosystem. Our Copilot app requires Microsoft Teams, and our Power Platform solution is built on Dataverse with integrations to SharePoint, Teams, and other Microsoft 365 services.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### What if we're already partway through our ISO 27001 implementation?

Kudoo can be implemented at any stage of your ISO 27001 journey. The platform includes tools to assess your current implementation status and seamlessly integrate existing documentation and evidence into our structured framework.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### How long does typical implementation take?

With Kudoo, most organizations achieve ISO 27001 certification readiness within 6-12 months, depending on organization size and complexity. Our structured approach typically reduces implementation time by 30-40% compared to traditional methods.
:::
:::
:::
:::
